title:
What happened to Harvard Jennings from WAAV 980AM? 



Mr. Jennings and I are diametrically opposites on political matters, but he earned my respect over the many years I listened to him. 



He is a very honest, honorable man, and someone who I miss. I have listened to him since 1992 when he was a guest host on many programs. His sense of right and wrong were very clear, and I totally agreed with him on moral issues...



Sincerely,

Bill Bryan

Kure Beach, NC
text:
Here's a link to a story Si Cantwell wrote when Jennings wrapped up
his career: 



http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100525/ARTICLES/100529711?Title=Here-Now-WAAV-waves-goodbye-to-longtime-radio-host
